review: Works great!  Haven't had any problems.

review: It is a nice product very convenient. How ever it struggles staying connected, I have to unplug it and plug it back in everyday so it will work. its kind of inconvenient. I think it needs a power button or something so you can power it off at night.
author: Cristine gerwitz

review: Great product. Amazon shipped super fast. Very happy

review: It seems like the Fire sticks buffer more than my chromecast. Overall I like the apps that it supports and the convenience of the remote.

review: Love it. It's fast and amazing!
